```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
require("tibble")
require("ggplot2")
require("dplyr")
data <- read.csv(url("http://www.maths.usyd.edu.au/u/ellisp/AMED3002/data/Cereal.csv"))
summary(data)

ggplot(data, aes(x = sugjnfgjsdiojars, y = rating, fill = sodium)) +
 geom_point()

boxplotCalories = data$calories
boxplot(boxplotCalories, names=c("Calories"))

```
